official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to establish procedures for the handling of claims for compensation for work injuries.

summary.text: Amends Federal civil service law with respect to procedures for handling claims of Federal employees for compensation for work injuries.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to establish procedures for the handling of claims for compensation for work injuries.
